original_text:
The stones of the wall will cry out,
    and the beams of the woodwork will echo it.
korean_text: 담에서 돌이 부르짖고 집에서 들보가 응답하리라

sentences.original_text: The stones of the wall will cry out
and the beams of the woodwork will echo it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 목재의 들보가 그것을 울려 퍼지게 할 것입니다
